mapper.insert: insert into board (user_id, subject, content, hit, recommendation, comment, date, isnotice) values (#{userId}, #{subject}, #{content}, 0, 0, 0, now(), #{isnotice})
mapper.select:
select b.article_no, b.user_id, b.subject, b.content, b.hit, b.recommendation, b.comment, b.date, b.isnotice, u.name from board b, user u where b.user_id = u.id and b.isnotice = 0
order by b.article_no desc limit #{start}, #{listsize}
